txt.en: While Fotak has been defeated,  Ânug-stazg is still a mustering camp for the forces in the western section of the Ashenslades.

'With the defeat of Fotak, the forces of Ânug-stazg have been scattered, and the threat to Mithechad has been diminished. However, the scattered forces do still serve a threat to the area.

'Will you go again to Ânug-stazg and defeat more of the Orcs? Many carry ashen spears made from the blighted wood of the Ashenslades...bring me several of these as well as a token of your success.

'Ânug-stazg lies to the east of Mithechad, beneath a canopy of twisted trees.'
Orcs may be found at Ânug-stazg, east of Mithechad.\n\nPerindúr has asked you to continue the battle against the Orcs of the western Ashenslades.

'Once again, your assistance was invaluable, [placeholder].

'With the defeat of these reinforcements, our ability to explore the cause of the strange malady affecting the trees has been increased tenfold.  

'Thank you again.'
Perindúr is at Mithechad, west of Ânug-stazg.\n\nYou should return to Perindúr and inform him that you have defeated the reinforcements that arrived at Ânug-stazg.
'Seek out and defeat Orcs near Ânug-stazg and retrieve any ashen spears that you might find.'
